{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Encore |model=ENHWI-2AN3 |revision= |upc=810731011011 |ean= |asin=B004VCWDX0 |price= |est_release_date=03/2010 |fcc_date=10/13/2008 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR97908003 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DTTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ENCOREXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^ENCORE[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} {{TagLine|802.11n Wireless N300 Router / Repeater / Access Point: 3-in-1}}
[http://www.encore-usa.com/th/product/ENHWI-2AN3 Product page]
[http://www.encore-usa.com/th/support/ENHWI-2AN3 Support page]
[http://www.encore-usa.com/us/sites/default/files/product_documents/ENHWI-2AN3_UM.pdf Manual] '''DD-WRT''' (and possibly also '''OpenWrt''') is currently only flashable to this model via serial. The default SSID is '''ENCOREXXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last 3 octets of the wireless interface MAC address. The stock firmware allows for up to four separate SSID's. By default, they are '''ENCOREXXXXXX_2''', '''ENCOREXXXXXX_3''', and '''ENCOREXXXXXX_4'''. Each ID can have separate security settings.
